title: Bannon Caught Scammin’, Postal Switcheroo 8.21.20
itunes:title: Bannon Caught Scammin’, Postal Switcheroo 8.21.20
description:
In episode 699, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian Beth Stelling to discuss Steve Bannon being indicted for fraud, how the recession could help the USPS, what it would like if Lyft and Uber left California, what we're watching for Monday, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Bannon, three others charged with defrauding donors of 'We Build The Wall' campaign
  2. Can the Post Office Handle Election Mail? Why the Recession Could Actually Help
  3. What Happens If Uber and Lyft Flee California? Look at Austin
  4. ‘The Legend Of Korra’ Is Well On Its Way To Breaking These Netflix Records Set By ‘Avatar: The Last Airbender’
  5. WATCH: HERO - Stay The Night (OFFICIAL MUSIC VIDEO)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
